oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood to Coredelia Atwood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood, Co. D, 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA to his wife Cordelia and their children discussing the "engagement here between our forces and Forest which occurred the 3rd, 4, and 5 of this month." He continues to describe the Battle of Johnsonville in great detail.
